## isValidDate() function

### isValidDate() function

isValidDate returns true if given string can be parsed into valid Date object, false otherwise

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function isValidDate(dateString: string): boolean;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { isValidDate } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dateString | <code>string</code> | string representation of a date |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
